DOC.brief_summary: To validate the morphine-sparing effect and safety of parecoxib administered intravenously for the treatment of Chinese subjects with postoperative pain following gynecological or orthopedic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Morphine-Sparing Effect And Safety Of Parecoxib Administered Intravenously For The Treatment Of Postoperative Pain
DOC.criteria: Undergo gynecological or orthopedic surgery under epidural anesthesia A previous history of intolerance or hypersensitivity to any NSAID, cyclooxygenase2 selective inhibitors, sulphonamides, or any of the excipients of parecoxib.
